offence.offenceLegislation: Contrary to sections 1,1A and 3 of the Criminal Law Act 1977.
offence.offenceLegislationWelsh: Yn groes i adran 1, 1A a 3 Deddf Cyfraith Trosedd 1977.
offence.offenceTitle: Conspire to assault a person thereby occasioning them actual bodily harm
offence.offenceTitleWelsh: Cynllwynio i ymosod ar unigolyn a thrwy hynny beri gwir niwed corfforol iddynt
offence.wording: Conspire to assault a person thereby occasioning them actual bodily harm
offence.wordingWelsh: Cynllwynio i ymosod ar unigolyn a thrwy hynny beri gwir niwed corfforol iddynt
